message: Accept my generous offer and we can end this quickly!
You're being too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
Meet in the middle? That's not good enough! I'm still getting the short end of the stick.
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm still not convinced. Meet me here!
You're not budging, I'll meet you halfway this time
Halfway is not good enough, Bob. I need a better deal to make up for the lost value.
Let's split it down the middle, Bob. It's the fairest way to end this.
